definition[0]: someone who is unfortunate has something bad happen to them
example[0]: When we entered the room, the teacher was yelling at some unfortunate student.
definition[1]: an unfortunate situation, condition, quality etc is one that you wish was different
example[2]: He has an unfortunate habit of repeating himself.
example[3]: It’s most unfortunate  (=very unfortunate) that your father can’t come to the wedding.
example[4]: It’s unfortunate that so few people seem willing to help.
definition[3]: unfortunate behaviour, remarks etc make people feel embarrassed or offended
definition[4]: someone who has no money, home, job etc
